title: Lee Sin remake for the lost of the jungle ward item that he needs.
body:
Hello Riot i am a Lee Sin main that is dedicated to Lee Sin only, and i have to say that the removing of the ward jungle item realy made him a useless champ. I am forced to go sup items in jungle to get the wards later but they arent even worth since the stats they give are useless late game and it uses a whole slot for a much better item its actualy realy anoying.

Lee was already a weak champion that is only decent on good leesin players.

My idea is that creating a personal item for lee like viktor has.
Wich you can upgrade in 3 diffrent stages.
you get this item for free from beginn as a passiv and its can have a condition like at 10 min your item evolves in to a warding item then this item can be upgrade in 2 ways: AD and Tank.

After 10 min for 1000 gold you can upgrade to warding item + some ad or warding item + some health
For 2500 gold more ad or more health and for 3000 gold last upgrade: i think this way of fixing lee problems with his wards is decent but it needs the right balancing from the balancing team "snezze" "balance" but if you dont do anything to fix the problem for lee he will be useless and boring to play.

replies.body: The whole ward problem could be easily solved by reworking his W into a skillshot dash so he can finally use wards for warding and meanwhile make plays like before especially when sightstone and the warding jng item got removed.
since you're a Lee Sin Main: Have you tried Relic Shield as that Special Item? I would really like to know how long it takes to get the free sightstone, if you get that Item on the first back.
Lee hat dann mehr vision und visionclear (da er swipetrinket nehmen kann) als alle anderen jungeler sprich er kann mehr wards setzen UND mehr wards clearen. Erscheint mir nicht ganz fair.

1. wir sind hier im deutschen Forum
2. das ist ein Communityforum, Riot Mitarbeiter verirren sich so gut wie nie hierher

3. deinen Vorschlag finde ich ganz interessant, habe noch gar nicht über soetwas nachgedacht, allerdings halte ich es für zu unausgeglichen. Die Vorteile gegenüber anderen Champs sind einfach zu groß (deutlich mehr Vision als bspw. der gegnerische Jungler, ein AD-/Health-Item mehr als alle anderen,.....)
